summaries.default: Senior Software Engineer with a strong backend focus and a track record of building reliable, scalable systems. Experienced across TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud-native architectures, with a practical approach to system design, performance, and long-term maintainability.
summaries.ic: Senior Software Engineer specializing in backend systems, APIs, and data-intensive services. Deeply hands-on with TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud platforms, with an emphasis on clean architecture, observability, and performance.
summaries.leadership: Senior Software Engineer with experience guiding technical direction, mentoring engineers, and owning complex backend systems. Comfortable balancing hands-on execution with architectural decision-making and cross-team collaboration.

highlights: Designed and implemented TypeScript-based backend services supporting high-volume transactional workloads
Refactored legacy Node.js services to improve fault isolation, testability, and deployment safety
Built and maintained REST APIs with clear versioning and backward compatibility guarantees
Introduced structured logging, metrics, and tracing to improve observability and incident response
Collaborated with product and infrastructure teams to plan and deliver multi-quarter initiatives
Developed backend services in Node.js and TypeScript to support e-commerce checkout and fulfillment flows
Implemented PostgreSQL schema changes and query optimizations to improve read and write performance
Integrated third-party payment and shipping providers using well-isolated service adapters
Wrote automated unit and integration tests to improve confidence in production releases
Built internal tools and APIs for data ingestion and reporting pipelines
Maintained Python and Node.js services used for scheduled data processing jobs
Assisted with on-call rotations and production issue investigations
Collaborated with senior engineers to improve code quality and deployment practices
